Consumers trust user-generated content more than traditional advertising In the present digital world, the modes of advertising are countless. From offline marketing to digital marketing, outbound and inbound marketing among others. The choice of a particular type of marketing depends on the type of business as well as preference. According to recent research by Nielsen Consumer Trust Index, more than ninety percent of consumers put more trust in organic, user generated content un comparison to traditional means of advertising. Stackla, a marketing platform had come up with an email plugin that enables user generated content for email marketers.
